issue.title: Excel crashes when opening large files
issue.description: Excel 2019 crashes immediately when trying to open files larger than 50MB. Error message: 'Excel has stopped working'. Smaller files open fine. This affects my monthly budget reports.
issue.technical_details: Crash occurs during file load. Event Viewer shows Application Error Event ID 1000. Faulting module: EXCEL.EXE. Exception code: 0xc0000005. Tried safe mode - same issue.

resolution.notes: Attempting repair installation of Office. User has large external data connections causing memory issues.
